Text: Big fan of this style (self-contained series) like this, or Superman for tomorrow, and would love to see more posts like this. Thanks for all the uls.
PULIKUNNEL:Hope you liked my other uploads,I don't plan to stop...be on the lookout for few other gems I'll be uploading

NICE :) 
i'm a BIG FAN of the silver age ^^ 
thx a lot my friend ^^

Good day! I'm actually new to reading comics (new 52 encouraged me to read) and I've downloaded some of the new and old crossovers such as Flashpoint and Final Crisis, was just wondering if you have any idea of Zero Hour and Final Night. I mean, are they must reads? So far, I can see that the must reads are the Crisis events as well as those related to them. Thanks for the UL btw, downloaded this and GL rebirth because I am a fan of both of them.
sora1203:Sorry for the late reply---in my opinion Zero Hour and Final Night are definitely not must reads...hope this helps...
It's ok, where do you suggest I start? Sorry if am bothering you or what. Maybe we can talk via email or something? :)
BTW, can I request for flash 2010 #4? I can't seem to find it anywhere. Found everything here on TPB except issue 4 :|
some more gems? i think i'm going to faint :) you're just unbelievable man. thanks for all your hard work.
Love this series. Halfway through and (spoiler!) flash outran superman. Wonderful. Thanks for the ul.
@mirrormaster82 , thanks very much for great uploads :)  Can u pls upload "Nightrunner" comics from Dc.
Yes, thank you mirrormaster. You're a great help for us comic fans.
